headline: RPKI - The required cryptographic upgrade to BGP routing
keywords: Crypto Week, BGP, RPKI, Security, Crypto, Product News
description: We have talked about the BGP Internet routing protocol before. We have talked about how we build a more resilient network and how we can see outages at a country-level via BGP. We have even talked about the network community that is vital to the operation of the global Internet.
